title: Broadway Heights
typeOfFood: Lacto, Italian, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegans could get bruschetta on focaccia bread or the Greek salad served with spinach tossed in a red wine vinaigrette (ask to omit feta). Also ask about salads and sandwiches choices. Marinated eggplant is a substitute on any sandwich. The restaurant is located upstairs in a historic brick building that overlooks downtown Chico.
